properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All His Work Is Ended, Joyfully We Sing, Jesus Hath Ascended! Glory To Our King!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Golden Harps Are Sounding, Angels Voices Sing, Pearly Gates Are Opened, Opened For The King; Jesus, King Of Glory, Jesus, King Of Love, Is Gone Up In Triumph, To His Throne Above.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He Who Came To Save Us, He Who Bled And Died, Now Is Crowned With Glory At His Fatherâ€™s Side. From The Grave Arisen, Nevermore To Die; Jesus, King Of Glory, Is Gone Up On High.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
